OnPremUserManagementException - Class in com.okta.scim.server.exception
This exception is thrown by the server when it cannot return the output when any exception condition occurs, such as inability to access the remote application, the remote application threw an exception, or internal issues.
OnPremUserManagementException(String, String) - Constructor for class com.okta.scim.server.exception.OnPremUserManagementException
internalCode is any arbitrary code to associate with the exception.
OnPremUserManagementException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for class com.okta.scim.server.exception.OnPremUserManagementException
message is a description for the exception.
OnPremUserManagementException(String, String, Throwable) - Constructor for class com.okta.scim.server.exception.OnPremUserManagementException
message is a description for the exception, and internalCode is any arbitrary code to associate with the exception.
OnPremUserManagementException(String, String, String, Throwable) - Constructor for class com.okta.scim.server.exception.OnPremUserManagementException
message is a description for the exception, internalCode is any arbitrary code to associate with the exception, helperUrl is a URL for referral to help fix the issue.

SCIMResource - Class in com.okta.scim.util.model

This class holds the following attributes: Custom SCIM attributes of a resource - custom properties map

All the standard attributes can be accessed using the getters and setters of the Resource object.
